author: makortel
body:
This PR suggests to remove `RecoTracker/Configuration/python/customizeForClusterSplitting.py` as it has been superseded by the jet core iteration in #6822. Removing the file would ease future migrations.

@mtosi @JanFSchulte @VinInn @rovere @arizzi
title: [RFC] Remove customizeForClusterSplitting() as obsolete
